{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CZ.NIC |model=Turris |revision=v1 (1.0/1.1) |asin= |price= |est_release_date=01/03/2014 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=5.34 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=P2020 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128P90TFIR1 |fla2=256 |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MT29F2G08ABAEA |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag=<!-- yes,, populated,, 34-pin header --> |serial=yes,, internal,, microUSB,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb DNXA-H1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=<!-- Lattice;LCMXO1200C;;1; ,,, ETH CHIP;IM KSZ, 9031RNXCA, ;;1; --> |flags=SIM Card slot, GPIO, SDIO, UART, I2C |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;Turris OS;OpenWrt-deriv; |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=Turris |default_ssid_regex=^Turris$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=00:0B:6B |oui_eth=D8:58:D7 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Open-Source Router}} :[https://project.turris.cz/en/hardware Product page] {{•}} [https://project.turris.cz/en/news/turris/ News] {{•}} [https://project.turris.cz/en/overview/ Overview]
*{{WPLink|Turris Omnia}}
===Specifications=== *'''Turris 1.0''' - ''Wireless Router'' :CPU: [[Freescale]] P2020 @1.2GHz :Flash: 16MB (NOR), 256MB (NAND) :RAM: 2GB (DDR3 SO-DIMM) :WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 5x GbE, 2x USB 2.0 ports :Wi‑Fi: 2.4/5 GHz Dual-Band (3×3 Mini PCIe) *'''Turris 1.1''' - ''Wireless Router'' :CPU: [[Freescale]] P2020 @1.2GHz :Flash: 16MB (NOR), 256MB (NAND) :RAM: 2GB (DDR3 SO-DIMM) :WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 5x GbE, SIM Card slot :USB: 2x USB 2.0, 3x USB 3.0 (1x ext, 2x int) :Wi‑Fi: 2.4/5 GHz Dual-Band (3×3 Mini PCIe)
===News=== *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turris-mox-modular-open-source-router-wifi/coming_soon ''Project Turris'' on '''Indiegogo''' campaign] *[http://www.tech-blog.pl/2014/01/03/turris-otwarty-projekt-bardzo-wydajnego-routera-z-czech/ ''Project Turris'' on '''tech-blog.pl'''] (internal images) *[http://openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=40&t=2986 ''Project Turris'' on '''openrouter.info'''] (internal images) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/03/27/turris-mox-is-a-modular-router-with-wifi-ssd-lte-modem-ethernet-and-sfp-fiber-modules-crowdfunding/ ''Turris MOX'' review on '''SNX-Software''']
